channel.title: Pictures in pure HTML with chafa and aha
channel.description:
Really cool post by a Debian dev on using `chafa` and `aha` to convert images into colored HTML equivalents. This is like ACII art on steroids.
http://noone.org/blog/English/Computer/Pictures%20in%20pure%20HTML%20with%20chafa%20and%20aha.html
